title: Jus Carnival
description: This summer, JUS Broadcasting is bringing the HEAT, with the Debut of JUS Carnival on September 12th at Eisenhower Park in Westbury, NY. title: Jus Carnival - Best of the Best Bhangra Competition (Punjabi)
description: This summer, JUS Broadcasting is bringing the HEAT, with the Debut of JUS Carnival on September 12th at Eisenhower Park in Westbury, NY. "BEST OF THE BEST" Bhangra competition will be featured at this first ever event where the Top 10 teams will be selected to perform in front of over 20,000 people and aired on JUS Punjabi TV. REGISTRATION NOW OPEN. to apply, send info and questions to: Bhangra@jusbroadcasting.com or call: 718.752.9290 ext. 106. Applicants, please standby for registration forms..
